pageContext.projectSummary: My project is HWA-DOO which is an installation work interacting with viewers. I ask them a question that what is fine art and what is graphic design. So, People's experiences here are important. Because the exhibition itself is a process in which everyone finds answers together through their input and output.
pageContext.projectProcess: I traced two paintings and made them graphic design works. And, using clay, I designed a mobile and sculptures people can move. Every objects can be rearranged by viewers as how they want to make own poster.
